source.835e556c:
# Read JSON File method
def get_json_data(file_name):
    """
    Read json data file and return list
    """
    with open(file_name) as f:
        data = json.load(f)
    # print(type(data["usedCars"]))
    return data["usedCars"]
source.5263eca6:
file_path = "../input/pakistans-largest-pakwheels-automobiles-listings/usedCars.json"
json_list = get_json_data(file_path) # Read json file and return list
df = pd.json_normalize(json_list) # convert (nested)json data to pandas dataframe
rows, col = df.shape # dataframe shape
print(f"Dataset has {rows} rows and {col} columns.")
